info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 31 at 12:59PM PDT until July 31 at 2:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR EASTERN NYE AND NORTHWESTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 1259 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pahrump, Rainbow Canyon, Mt. Charleston, Spring Mountains, Mcwilliams Campground, Dolomite Campground, Willow Creek Campground, Mary Jane Falls Campground, Mahogany Grove Campground, Hilltop Campground, Fletcher View Campground, Kyle Canyon Campground, Indian Springs and Lovell Canyon Campground. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
